text: The Dawn Patrol is a 1930 American World War I action movie directed by Howard Hawks and was based on the novel The Flight Commander by John Mark Saunders. It stars Richard Barthelmess, Douglas Fairbanks, Jr., Neil Hamilton, Frank McHugh, Clyde Cook, Gardner James and won an Academy Award in 1931. It was remade in 1938. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1930 war movies Category:1930s action movies Category:American action movies Category:American war movies Category:World War I movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Howard Hawks
title: The Dawn Patrol (1930 movie)
